name: SJDocument
summary: fetch, rename, save and delete the image, file using SJDocument framework
description:
Using SJDocument framework you folloing functionality peform
- Fetch, Store, Remove the Image
- Fetch, Store, Remove the Files
- Fetch, Store, Remove the Pdf
- Flush all store images or files
